Technologies makes several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick said in a statement acquired by the Associated Press. Before joining Google a decade ago, Eric Schmidt served as an exec at computer networking maker Novell( NOVL) and Sun Microsystems, which is now owned by Oracle( ORCL). My estimate is that Eric Schmidt likes to be in the game. He likes to be a player, said Roger Kay . It's unlikely Eric Schmidt will retire with his billions, taking up sailing or traveling. Indeed, there's a rumor he's trying to land a gig on cable television.

though revenue climbed 15 percent. "We are enthusiastic about the consumer response to our holiday lineup of products, including the launch of Kinect," said Microsoft chief financial officer Peter Klein. The pace of business spending, combined with strong consumer demand, led to another quarter of operating margin expansion and solid earnings per share growth. Microsoft sold more than eight million gesture-sensing Kinect controllers for Xbox 360 videogame consoles in the 60 days after it hit the market in November, chief executive Steve Ballmer said early this month.
